Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentInfos

  • Packages that use SegmentInfos 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.index
    Code to maintain and access indices.

    • Uses of SegmentInfos in org.apache.lucene.index

      Methods in org.apache.lucene.index that return SegmentInfos 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SegmentInfos SegmentInfos.clone()
      Returns a copy of this instance, also copying each SegmentInfo.
      static SegmentInfos SegmentInfos.readCommit(Directory directory, String segmentFileName)
      Read a particular segmentFileName.
      static SegmentInfos SegmentInfos.readLatestCommit(Directory directory)
      Find the latest commit (segments_N file) and load all SegmentCommitInfos.

      Determine what set of merge operations are now necessary on the index.

      Checks if any merges are now necessary and returns a MergePolicy.MergeSpecification if so.
      protected boolean LogMergePolicy.isMerged(SegmentInfos infos, int maxNumSegments, Map<SegmentCommitInfo,Boolean> segmentsToMerge, IndexWriter writer)
      Returns true if the number of segments eligible for merging is less than or equal to the specified maxNumSegments.
      protected boolean MergePolicy.isMerged(SegmentInfos infos, SegmentCommitInfo info, IndexWriter writer)
      Returns true if this single info is already fully merged (has no pending deletes, is in the same dir as the writer, and matches the current compound file setting
